content.text: SNIPER: site-crafter - Web to Flask Project Converter

text: A powerful tool that downloads a live website and automatically converts
it into a fully functional, local Flask project.
[cyan]<URL>[/]                  The full URL of the website to clone.
[green]-p, --project <NAME>[/]  The name for the new project directory.
[green]-h, --help[/]             Show this help message and exit.
[green]--no-venv[/]             Skip the creation of a Python virtual environment.
[green]--run[/]                 Attempt to run the Flask server after creation.
